videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL

speed: 1/2000-1 s 4 s (Choose a style is set to Photograph fireworks)
ioterminal: Audio/video (A/V) output; digital I/O (USB) HDMI micro connector (Type D) (HDMI output)
monitor: 6.7 cm (2.7-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
movie: Large (1080p) (default setting): 1920 x 1080/16:9/approx. 30 fps, Small (640): 640 x 480/4:3/approx. 30 fps, Small (old-fashioned): 640 x 480/4:3/approx. 15 fps
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
imagesizephotosize: 13 megapixels [4160 x 3120] 4 megapixels [2272 x 1704] 2 megapixels [1600 x 1200]
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 107.6 x 66.1 x 40.4 mm (4.3 x 2.7 x 1.6 in.) (excluding projections)
dustproof: JIS/IEC protection class 6 (IP6X) equivalent (under our testing conditions)
exposuremeteringmode: Matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
focallength: 4.1-12.3 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 30-90 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
moviesactualbatterylifeforrecording2: Approx. 1 h 35 min when using EN-EL19

(wide-angle position) to infinity (All distances measured from center of front surface of the protective glass)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
storagemedia: Internal memory (approx. 25 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Voice messages: WAV Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: LPCM stereo)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual picture)
shootingmodes: Point and Shoot, Choose a Style (Shoot night scenes, Shoot close-ups, Photograph food, Shoot at intervals, Shoot under water, Take a series of pictures, Photograph fireworks, Shoot backlit scenes, Mirror, Add a bubble effect, Add a neon effect, Add a cartoon effect, Take soft pictures, Create a diorama effect)
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 96% horizontal and 96% vertical (compared to actual picture)
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 360 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
shockproof: Cleared our testing conditions *3 compliant with MIL-STD 810F Method 516.5-Shock
motionblurreduction: Motion detection (still pictures), electronic VR (still pictures)
waterproof: JIS/IEC protection class 8 (IPX8) equivalent (under our testing conditions) Capacity to shoot pictures underwater up to a depth of 10 m (32 ft) and for 60 minutes
imagesensor: 1/3.1-in. type CMOS; approx. 14.17 million total pixels
